refnamediv.refpurpose: returns a copy of a shape with all coordinates shifted by the provided dX, dY and then multiplied by Xfactor and Yfactor.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: returns a copy of a shape with all coordinates shifted by the provided dX, dY and then multiplied by Xfactor and Yfactor. Different values for Xfactor and Yfactor will result in distorted arcs.

example.title: Simple Use
example.screen:
